FileFormat.FormatDescription: A NetWare Loadable Module (NLM) is a loadable kernel module (a binary code module) that can be loaded into Novell's NetWare operating system. NLMs can implement hardware drivers, server functions (e.g. clustering), applications (e.g. GroupWise), system libraries or utilities.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF:'NetWare Loadable Module' followed by 0x1A followed by 0x04
